Event-type.md - Grip

Event types are returned from the Events methods under the modio::Event schema.

Name Value Description
EVENT_UNDEFINED 0 An error occurred, if you see this message check your logs for details.
EVENT_MODFILE_CHANGED 1 Primary file changed, the mod should be updated.
EVENT_MOD_AVAILABLE 2 Mod is marked as accepted and public.
EVENT_MOD_UNAVAILABLE 3 Mod is marked as not accepted, deleted or hidden.
EVENT_MOD_EDITED 4 The mod was updated (triggered when any column value changes).
MODIO_EVENT_USER_TEAM_JOIN 5 User has joined a team.
MODIO_EVENT_USER_TEAM_LEAVE 6 User has left a team.
MODIO_EVENT_USER_SUBSCRIBE 7 User has subscribed to a mod.
MODIO_EVENT_USER_UNSUBSCRIBE 8 User has un-subscribed from a mod.
